So you'll accept my soul + 10% interest?:D

Chris...I'd be happy to offer you the same price I paid for the drum Hofman in 1992.  LMK...I'll be anxiously awaiting your response?!?!
Pull the Lowdy and we have a deal.
:eek:
Where are those two crazy Drum-collecting guys when you need them ?!?!
Here and present, yet broke compared to recent prices.  :(

10% finders fee if you can send them my way* :)

* Must be an unconditional sale and percentage is highly subject to my mood.
Chris- PM sent on both cards.

Interesting. 

Sale Pending.

Thanks for the deal, Chris. 

These cards are red hot, glad i was able to get them from you.

Best-
M

This of course was in full jest but the few offers I've had for  my "real" pricing sure makes you consider it. 

Crazy...

Thanks for the fun replies and messages.

Yes...Chris & i were just messin'...an early attempt at April fool's. ;)

Chris- these cards are super rare, good luck with sale!
Chris I am interested in the drum for $86,000. please PM me :)
John.. you've been watching way to much Prices Right :)
